context_bundle.summary: Distributed systems architecture: CAP theorem (Consistency, Availability, Partition-tolerance - pick 2). Consensus algorithms (Raft, Paxos). Replication strategies. Eventual vs strong consistency trade-offs.

onboarding.quick_start: CAP: Choose 2 of Consistency/Availability/Partition-tolerance. PhiVector chooses AP (Available + Partition-tolerant), eventual consistency. Consensus: Raft (leader election), Paxos (academic). Replication: Master-slave, multi-master.
common_patterns: CAP theorem: CA (single node), CP (consistent but unavailable during partition), AP (eventually consistent, always available)
Raft consensus: Leader election, log replication
